system.description: Also at 1st level, your close association to curses grants you an expertise die on saves against spells of the Affliction school as well as any magical effect originating from a source outside yourself that would result in you being charmed, frightened, petrified, poisoned, slowed, cause you to gain levels of fatigue or strife, impose disadvantage on one or more of your saving throws, cause you to become vulnerable to one or more types of damage, or result in your infection with a disease.
